title: PyAdventure: Learn Python Through Adventure
description: A beginner-friendly adventure game for learning Python

scenes.title: Welcome to PyAdventure!
scenes.description: You find yourself in a mysterious digital world where Python code is the key to survival. Your journey begins here.

scenes.title: The Variable Valley
scenes.description: You enter a valley where data flows like rivers. To cross safely, you must understand variables.
scenes.code_example:
name = 'adventurer'
age = 25
print(f'Hello, {name}! You are {age} years old.')

challenge.prompt: Create a variable called 'message' and set it to 'Hello, Python!'
challenge.hint: Use the assignment operator (=) to create a variable

scenes.title: The Coding Forest
scenes.description: You venture into a forest where the trees whisper secrets of programming.

scenes.title: Your Adventure Continues...
scenes.description: This is just the beginning of your Python adventure. More challenges await!
